attributes.action: Create a benefit system that works
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If someone is on benefits for more than a month they should be made to do a couple of hours work a day - cleaning the streets, looking after the elderly etc. This will prevent people becoming stuck in the rut of sitting around at home, so will make them want to go out and find work, will save money on council workers, and will mean we will have nice clean streets
